parameters.name: DtsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the data synchronization or change tracking instance.

parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data synchronization or change tracking task.

parameters.name: SynchronizationDirection
parameters.description:
The synchronization direction. Valid values:

*   **Forward**
*   **Reverse**

> 
*   Default value: **Forward**.
*   You can set this parameter to **Reverse** to reset the reverse synchronization task only when the topology is two-way synchronization.
